Question.Subject: How come when I download something from Megaupload, it turns out to be only 17KB?
Question.Content:
When I download any kind of file from "MegaUpload" it says like [500MB] in the "Mega Manager", but when I go to the file itself, it’s only 15-17KB. ALSO, it the file doesn't open properly:
Ex: A rar. file says "Unexpected end of Archive" when I open it
Can someone tell me what the heck is going on and/or how to fix it?
Also, on my other computer, it works fine. So, it’s not the uploaders fault either o.o
Question.ChosenAnswer: Your download is either stopping at 17KB for some reason or your downloading the download button picture and not the download itself.

Answer.Content: Your download is either stopping at 17KB for some reason or your downloading the download button picture and not the download itself.
